1621500.name: ShootRun Demo
1621500.description:
Demo version is same as full, only has less stages.
So the most interesting stages are waiting for you.
Plus to this later will be added Bonus stages, available only
for full version.

Design of the game you can check by photo / video and streams on youtube.
But be carefull because game is changing and video on youtube may show you old version.

Hope you will enjoy it.
Have fun.
1621500.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
